TestStep.Description: Install a WIFI-EAP certificates on the device. Certificate should have been pushed on the DUT before installation.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Parameter.name: CERTIFICATE_FILE
Parameter.Description: Full path (on the device) of the certificate file to install.

Parameter.name: CA_GUARD_PASSWORD
Parameter.Description: Password to install the certificate

Parameter.name: EAP_PASSWORD
Parameter.Description: Password to open the certificate file

Parameter.name: CREDENTIAL_PASSWORD
Parameter.Description: Password to set for the device credential

TestStep.Description: Clears wifi credentials from device and remove pin code if necessary

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Parameter.name: CREDENTIAL_PASSWORD
Parameter.Description: Password to set for the device credential

Parameter.name: PIN_CODE_REMOVAL
Parameter.Description: option to remove pin code already set

TestStep.Description: Manages the wifi interface power state.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Parameter.name: POWER
Parameter.Description: Power state you want to set

Parameter.name: TIMEOUT
Parameter.Description: Max time to wait for wifi to turn on/off, in seconds

TestStep.Description: Gets the power state of the wifi interface.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Description.Key: Name of the context variable where the value will be saved.

TestStep.Description: Request a scan of wifi networks.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

TestStep.Description: Manages the wifi softAP configuration.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Parameter.name: POWER
Parameter.Description: Power state you want to set

Parameter.name: SSID
Parameter.Description: The soft access point's SSID

Parameter.name: SECURITY
Parameter.Description: The soft access point's security

Parameter.name: PASSPHRASE
Parameter.Description: The soft access point's passphrase

Parameter.name: STANDARD
Parameter.Description: The soft access point's standard

Parameter.name: CHANNEL
Parameter.Description: The soft access point's channel

Parameter.name: HIDDEN
Parameter.Description: Set the visibility status of the soft access point.If on, the soft access point doesn't broadcast his SSID

TestStep.Description: Get the wifi softAP parameters.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Description.Key: Hotspot power status. Values : on;off.
Hotspot SSID.
Type of hotspot security. Values : OPEN;WPA2.
Passphrase used for security.
Standard of Hotspot. Values : 2_4GHZ_20MHZ;5GHZ_20MHZ;5GHZ_40MHZ;5GHZ_80MHZ.
Hotspot hidden visibility. Values : on;off

TestStep.Description: Adds a remembered Wifi network in the networks list.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Parameter.name: SSID
Parameter.Description: The access point's SSID.

Parameter.name: SECURITY
Parameter.Description: The access point's security.

Parameter.name: PASS_PHRASE
Parameter.Description: The access point's passphrase.

Parameter.name: EAP_METHOD
Parameter.Description: EAP method used when WIFI_SECURITY is "EAP-WAP" or "EAP-WPA2".

Parameter.name: EAP_USER
Parameter.Description: Optional EAP user used when WIFI_SECURITY is "EAP-WAP" or "EAP-WPA2".

Parameter.name: EAP_PASSWORD
Parameter.Description: Optional EAP password used when WIFI_SECURITY is "EAP-WAP" or "EAP-WPA2".

Parameter.name: PHASE2_AUTH
Parameter.Description: Phase2 authentication used when WIFI_SECURITY is "EAP-WAP" or "EAP-WPA2".

Parameter.name: CERTIFICAT_NAME
Parameter.Description: Certificate file name

Parameter.name: USE_CERTIFICATE
Parameter.Description: Set to 'true' if you need to use certificates at the same time as TTLS or PEAP.

Parameter.name: STATIC_IP
Parameter.Description: static: DUT static ip setting; dhcp: DUT to retrieve the IP from DHCP server

Parameter.name: IP_ADDRESS
Parameter.Description: DUT static ip setting for inet.

Parameter.name: IP_NETMASK
Parameter.Description: DUT static ip setting for netmask.

Parameter.name: IP_GATEWAY
Parameter.Description: DUT static ip setting for gateway

Parameter.name: IP_DNS1
Parameter.Description: DUT static ip setting for dns1

Parameter.name: IP_DNS2
Parameter.Description: DUT static ip setting for dns2

Parameter.name: PROXY_CONFIG
Parameter.Description: NONE: Don't use a proxy - MANUAL : use a proxy - AUTO : use an automatic proxy.

Parameter.name: PROXY_ADDRESS
Parameter.Description: Address used by the proxy.

Parameter.name: PROXY_PORT
Parameter.Description: Port used by the proxy.

Parameter.name: PROXY_BYPASS
Parameter.Description: Addresses which must be bypassed by the proxy. Add multiple addresses separated with ','

TestStep.Description: Analyse the network scan result to get the devices SSIDs.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Description.Key: Name of the context variable where the value will be saved.

TestStep.Description: Remove from the (remembered) Network config the device using its SSID.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Parameter.name: SSID
Parameter.Description: SSID to remove from config. To remove all the remembered networks, use SSID="all".

TestStep.Description: Connect to the Wifi network

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Parameter.name: SSID
Parameter.Description: Network SSID to connect to

Parameter.name: TIMEOUT
Parameter.Description: Connection timeout.

TestStep.Description: Check state of a SSID. You can pass multiple check parameters. For example, STATE=CONNECTED,REMEMBERED,VISIBLE will check if SSID is connected, remembered and visible.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed.

Parameter.name: SSID
Parameter.Description: Network SSID to check state.

Parameter.name: STATE
Parameter.Description: Expected state of the SSID.

TestStep.Description: Wait for a state of a SSID. You can pass multiple check parameters. For example, STATE=CONNECTED,REMEMBERED,VISIBLE will wait for SSID is connected, remembered and visible.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed.

Parameter.name: SSID
Parameter.Description: Network SSID to check state.

Parameter.name: STATE
Parameter.Description: Expected state of the SSID.

Parameter.name: TIMEOUT
Parameter.Description: Timeout before raise an error.

TestStep.Description: Set the WiFi network notifications setting.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Parameter.name: NETWORK_NOTIFICATIONS
Parameter.Description: State of network notifications to set on DUT. Set true to enable, false to disable.

TestStep.Description: Get the WiFi network notifications setting.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Description.Key: Name of the context variable where the value will be saved. Possible values : true;false

TestStep.Description: Set the WiFi frequency band.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Parameter.name: FREQUENCY
Parameter.Description: Frequency band to set.

Parameter.name: INTERFACE
Parameter.Description: Interface to configure (wlan0, wlan1,...).

Parameter.name: SILENT_MODE
Parameter.Description: Enable or disable silent mode. In silent mode, errors doesn't raise an exception.

TestStep.Description: Get the WiFi frequency band on DUT.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Parameter.name: INTERFACE
Parameter.Description: Interface to use (wlan0, wlan1,...).

Description.Key: Name of the context variable where the value will be saved. Possible values : AUTO;2_4GHZ;5GHZ

TestStep.Description: Set the regulatory domain for a given interface.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Parameter.name: REGULATORY_DOMAIN
Parameter.Description: Regulatory domain to set.

Parameter.name: INTERFACE
Parameter.Description: Interface to configure (wlan0, wlan1,...).

TestStep.Description: Get the regulatory domain for a given interface.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed.

Description.Key: Name of the context variable where the value will be saved.

TestStep.Description: Set the WiFi sleep policy.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Parameter.name: SLEEP_POLICY
Parameter.Description: Sleep policy to set.

TestStep.Description: Get the WiFi sleep policy.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed.

Description.Key: Name of the context variable where the value will be saved. Possible values : ALWAYS;ONLY_WHEN_PLUGGED;NEVER

TestStep.Description: Set the WiFi scan always available setting.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Parameter.name: SCAN_ALWAYS_AVAILABLE_STATE
Parameter.Description: State of WiFi scan always available to set on DUT. Set "ON" to enable, "OFF" to disable.

TestStep.Description: Get the WiFi scan always available setting.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Description.Key: Name of the context variable where the value will be saved. Possible values : ON;OFF

TestStep.Description: Get the RSSI for WiFi interface. Device must have WiFi On.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed.

Parameter.name: SSID
Parameter.Description: Name of the SSID to check.

Description.Key: Name of the context variable where the value will be saved. Unit is dBm.

TestStep.Description: Do a Wireless Protected Setup on the access point.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Parameter.name: SSID
Parameter.Description: Name of the SSID to connect.

Parameter.name: WPS_METHOD
Parameter.Description: The WPS method you want to use. WPS-PIN-AP = LABEL mode WPS-PIN-DUT = PIN enrolee mode WPS-PBC = WPS Push button

Parameter.name: WPS_AP_PIN
Parameter.Description: The access point PIN code (for WPS_PIN_FROM_AP mode).

Parameter.name: WPS_TIMEOUT
Parameter.Description: WPS Connection timeout.

TestStep.Description: Remove previously remembered groups.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

TestStep.Description: Initiates wifi direct scan.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

TestStep.Description: Gets the Wifi direct scanned devices. To update the list, you've got to call WIFI_DIRECT_SCAN.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Parameter.name: STATE
Parameter.Description: If you want to get only the devices in a given state, use this field for filtering.

Description.Key: Name of the context variable where the peer devices list will be saved.Format is PEER1|PEER2|PEER3...

TestStep.Description: Gets the Wifi direct remembered groups.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Description.Key: Name of the context variable where the remembered groups list will be saved. Format is GROUP1|GROUP2|GROUP3... Return "EMPTY" if no groups are remembered.

TestStep.Description: Sets the Wifi direct devices name.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Parameter.name: PEER_DEVICE_NAME
Parameter.Description: The name you want to set.

TestStep.Description: Gets a Wifi Direct device address from its name.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Parameter.name: WIFI_DIRECT_NAME
Parameter.Description: The name of the peer device you want the address of.

Description.Key: Name of the context variable where the peer device address will be saved.

TestStep.Description: Gets the device Wifi Direct mac address.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Description.Key: Name of the context variable where the device mac address will be saved.

TestStep.Description: Connect to the wifi Direct peer device.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the connection will be initiated.

Parameter.name: PEER_DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Peer device to connect to.

Parameter.name: CONNECT_TYPE
Parameter.Description: Type of connection method.

Parameter.name: AUTHENTICATION_TYPE
Parameter.Description: Type of authentication method.

Parameter.name: PIN_CODE
Parameter.Description: PIN code for WPS-PIN.

Parameter.name: TIMEOUT
Parameter.Description: Connection timeout.

Parameter.name: GO_INTENT
Parameter.Description: Group owner intent.

Parameter.name: P2P_COM_FREQ
Parameter.Description: Frequency used for the communication (forced).

TestStep.Description: Grants a wifi Direct connection request (invitation) from another device. This should be called on the device receiving the connection before the initiator sends its connection request.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the connection will be initiated.

Parameter.name: PEER_DEV_MAC
Parameter.Description: MAC address of the peer device you want to allow the connection request.

Parameter.name: P2P_COM_FREQ
Parameter.Description: Frequency used for the communication (forced).

TestStep.Description: Disconnect from the wifi Direct peer device.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the disconnection will be initiated.

Parameter.name: WIFI_DIRECT_NAME
Parameter.Description: The name of the peer device you want the address of. If the parameter is not used, the test step will search a interface (get_wifi_direct_interface) to disconnect If no interface found, the test step will end with a message

TestStep.Description: Check if the peer devices are on the list of remembered groups. Call GET_WIFI_DIRECT_REMEMBERED_GROUPS to get this list.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Parameter.name: REMEMBERED_GROUPS_LIST
Parameter.Description: Current remembered groups list. Format is GROUP1|GROUP2|GROUP3...

Parameter.name: GROUP_OWNER
Parameter.Description: Peer device initiator of the group you want to check.

TestStep.Description: Gets the Wifi direct interface name

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Description.Key: Name of the context variable where the interface name will be saved.

TestStep.Description: Get the current mode of WiFi Direct. Device must have WiFi On and connected to another device with Wifi Direct.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed.

Parameter.name: INTERFACE
Parameter.Description: Name of the interface connected.

Description.Key: Name of the context variable where the value will be saved. Possible values : CLI, GO

TestStep.Description: Get the current bandwidth for WiFi interface. Device must have WiFi On and connected.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed.

Parameter.name: INTERFACE
Parameter.Description: Name of the interface connected.

Description.Key: Name of the context variable where the value will be saved. Unit is MHz. Possible values are : 20, 40 and 80

TestStep.Description: Get the current channel used for WiFi Direct. Device must have WiFi On and connected to another device with Wifi Direct.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed.

Description.Key: Name of the context variable where the channel frequency will be saved.
Name of the context variable where the channel number will be saved.

TestStep.Description: Gets the current Wi-Fi softAP used channel when using LTE. IT DEPENDS ON THE SYSDEBUG MECHANISM. SYSDEBUG_INIT must have been called, with WifiSoftApChannel in SYSDEBUG_MODULES, before using this step.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed.

Description.Key: Name of the context variable where the channel number will be saved.

TestStep.Description: Get the current channel for a WiFi interface. Device must have WiFi On and connected.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed.

Parameter.name: INTERFACE
Parameter.Description: Name of the interface connected. Available for WiFi STA or WiFi Direct.

Description.Key: Name of the context variable where the value will be saved. Values are a valid channel.

TestStep.Description: Configure WiFi Direct on Linux device

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

TestStep.Description: Enable WiFi Direct on Linux device

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

TestStep.Description: Create Autonomous Group for P2P connections on Linux

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

Parameter.name: GROUP_FREQ
Parameter.Description: Frequency of the P2P group to be created

Parameter.name: AUTHENTICATION_TYPE
Parameter.Description: Type of authentication method.

Description.Key: Name of the context variable where the pin code will be saved.

TestStep.Description: Set P2P interface to discover mode

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

TestStep.Description: Clear all existing P2P connection information

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed

TestStep.Description: Invite a peer to join a group or to reinvoke a persistent group.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the connection will be initiated.

Parameter.name: PEER_DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Peer device to connect to.

Parameter.name: P2P_COM_FREQ
Parameter.Description: Frequency used for the communication (forced).

TestStep.Description: Force specific parameters configuration for a WiFi Direct connection.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the connection will be initiated.

Parameter.name: P2P_MODE
Parameter.Description: Force P2P mode.

Parameter.name: P2P_FREQUENCY
Parameter.Description: Force P2P frequency.

TestStep.Description: Get the RSSI for WiFi Direct interface. Device must have WiFi On.

Parameter.name: DEVICE
Parameter.Description: Device name on which the action will be executed.

Parameter.name: INTERFACE
Parameter.Description: Name of the interface to check.

Description.Key: Name of the context variable where the value will be saved. Unit is dBm.
